variables.input:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| expand entity_tags
| fields entity_tags
| append [data record(entity_tags="NONE")]
| dedup entity_tags
| limit 100000

fetch dt.davis.problems
| expand labels.alerting_profile
| fields labels.alerting_profile
| append [data record(labels.alerting_profile="NONE")]
| dedup labels.alerting_profile
| limit 100000

1.title: Problems
1.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| filter if($entity_tags !="NONE", in(tags, $entity_tags), else:display_id!="")
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter if($alerting_profile !="NONE", in(labels.alerting_profile, $alerting_profile), else:display_id!="")
| dedup display_id
| summarize close_rs=max(closed),by:{display_id}
| summarize count=count()

3.title: Incidents
3.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| filter if($entity_tags !="NONE", in(tags, $entity_tags), else:display_id!="")
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter if($alerting_profile !="NONE", in(labels.alerting_profile, $alerting_profile), else:display_id!="")
| dedup display_id
| summarize close_rs=max(closed),by:{display_id}
| summarize count=count()

4.title: ðŸ”¸ Incidents w/o RCA
4.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED"
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| filter isNull(root_cause_entity_id) and isNull(root_cause_me_id)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id,root_cause_entity_id, root_cause_me_id}
| summarize count=count()

7.title: âš¡ Operations Efficiency
7.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd closed=if(event.status=="CLOSED", timestamp)
| filter isNotNull(closed)
| fieldsAdd RCA=if((isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id ) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id)),TRUE,else:FALSE )
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize close_rs=max(closed),
            resolved_problem_duration=max(toLong(resolved_problem_duration)),
            by:{display_id, RCA}
| fieldsAdd mttr_rca = if(RCA, toLong(resolved_problem_duration)), mttr_no_rca = if(NOT RCA, toLong(resolved_problem_duration))
| summarize operations_efficiency=(1 - ((median(toLong(mttr_no_rca))))/((median(toLong(mttr_rca)))+(median(toLong(mttr_no_rca)))))*100
| fields concat(round(operations_efficiency,decimals:2), " %")

8.title: âŒš Average MTTR With RCA (mins)
8.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.status_transition=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id

| fieldsAdd containRCA=(isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id))
| filter containRCA
| summarize problem_list=collectDistinct(display_id), 
            resolved_problem_duration=max(toLong(resolved_problem_duration)),
            by:{display_id, containRCA}
| fieldsAdd mttr_rca = if(containRCA, toLong(resolved_problem_duration))
| summarize total=(median(toLong(mttr_rca))/60000000000)
| fields concat(round(total,decimals:2), "")

9.title: âŒ› Average MTTR W/o RCA (mins)
9.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.status_transition=="CLOSED"
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd containnoRCA=(isNull(root_cause_entity_id))
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| filter containnoRCA
| summarize problem_list=collectDistinct(display_id), 
            resolved_problem_duration=median(toLong(resolved_problem_duration)),
            by:{display_id}
| summarize total=(median(toLong(resolved_problem_duration))/60000000000)
| fields concat(round(total,decimals:2), "")

12.title: ðŸ”¹ Incidents with RCA
12.query:
fetch events, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" 
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| filterOut isNull(root_cause_entity_id) and isNull(root_cause_me_id)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id,root_cause_entity_id, root_cause_me_id}
| summarize count=count()

singleValue.label: Incidents with RCA -> Higher the better

16.title: ðŸ’² Est Cost with RCA

17.title: ðŸ’² Est Cost w/o RCA

18.title: ðŸ’µ Current Savings with RCA

19.title: + Potential Savings with DAVIS AI Causation

20.title: ðŸ’° Total Savings will All Problems managed with DAVIS AI CAUSATION

21.content:
##### ðŸš¥ Operational Cost Parameter
---
>||  ðŸŸ¢ RCA   |   ðŸ”´ RCA
> --- | --: | --: 
>ðŸ‘¥ **No.**  **Resources** | $RCA_ResourceCount | $NoRCA_ResourceCount
>ðŸª™ **Hourly** **Cost** **/** **Resource** | $ $RCA_ResourceCost | $ $NoRCA_ResourceCost 

>
##### ðŸš¥ Problem to Incident Trans. Time:  ***$PIT_Selecor***
---

>Not all problems are required to be actioned. The parameter PIT_Selector is the threshold for total problem resolution time. In most cases, customers would ignore problems that were resolved in under 30 minutes.

26.title: â³ MTTR Comparison
26.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.status_transition=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| fieldsAdd containRCA=if((isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id)),"RCA", else:"NoRCA")
| summarize MTTR=avg(toLong(resolved_problem_duration))/3600000,
          by:{bin(timestamp,1h), containRCA}

27.title: ðŸ¤– DAVIS detected Problems RCA Vs NoRCA
27.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.status_transition=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| fieldsAdd containRCA=if((isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id)),"RCA", else:"NoRCA")
| summarize Problems=count(),
          by:{bin(timestamp, 12h), containRCA}

28.title: ã€½ï¸ Estimate Operation Cost Comparison RCA Vs NoRCA
28.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.status_transition=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| fieldsAdd containRCA=if((isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id)),"RCA", else:"NoRCA")
| fieldsAdd testRCA=(isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id))
| summarize TotalCost=if(takeAny(testRCA),((sum(toLong(resolved_problem_duration))/3600000000000)*toLong($RCA_ResourceCost)*toLong($RCA_ResourceCount)),else:(sum(toLong(resolved_problem_duration))/3600000)*toLong($NoRCA_ResourceCost)*toLong($NoRCA_ResourceCount)),
          by:{bin(timestamp, 12h), containRCA}

32.title: selected tags

44.title: Incidents RCA Vs NoRCA
44.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false 
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id,root_cause_entity_id, root_cause_me_id}
| fieldsAdd RCA=if(isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id), "RCA", else: "NoRCA")
| summarize SubTotal=count(), by:{RCA}

singleValue.label: Incidents with RCA -> Higher the better

45.title: Cost Distribution RCA Vs NoRCA
45.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.status_transition=="CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selecor)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id,root_cause_entity_id, root_cause_me_id, resolved_problem_duration}
| fieldsAdd containRCA=if((isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id)),"RCA", else:"NoRCA")
| fieldsAdd testRCA=(isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id) or isNotNull(root_cause_me_id))
| summarize TotalCost=if(takeAny(testRCA),((sum(toLong(resolved_problem_duration))/3600000)*toLong($RCA_ResourceCost)*toLong($RCA_ResourceCount)),else:(sum(toLong(resolved_problem_duration))/3600000)*toLong($NoRCA_ResourceCost)*toLong($NoRCA_ResourceCount)),
          by:{containRCA}

singleValue.label: Incidents with RCA -> Higher the better

55.content: >Not all problems are equal hence the MTTR for the problems may not provide absolute comparison between the two RCA and NoRCA MTTR. However, it provides reasonable indication of what can be done to optimise the MTTR event further. If MTTR of RCA is significantly higher, then we need to see if the adequate configuration has been performed so that the internal team is leveraging Dynatrace at its full capacity. Poorly configured Dynatrace may deter customerâ€™s team not to action due to alert storms.
